definition: commune member (PRC, 1958-1985)/member of a society (or other organization)
society/group/club/agency/(old) god of the land
person/employee/member

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地區內的扶輪社在社員發展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: In your experience, what benefits has recruitment brought to your club?
sentences.chinese: 在你經驗中，於貴社吸收新社員時有何益處？

sentences.english: Request that all clubs participate in a PolioPlus Partners project.
sentences.chinese: 擬定一個合適的新社員訓練計劃並與所有扶輪社分享。

sentences.english: How can you use public relations as a district-level membership tool?
sentences.chinese: 您如何運用公共關係來做爲地區層級的社員工具呢？

sentences.english: The commune members went at the building of a dam with a will.
sentences.chinese: 社員們幹勁十足地建築一道堤壩。

sentences.english: Keeping current club members is just as important as bringing in new ones, Dochterman said.
sentences.chinese: 留住現有的社員與引進新社員同等重要，陶德曼說。

sentences.english: Keeping current club members is just as important as bringing in new ones, Dochterman said.
sentences.chinese: 留住現有的社員與引進新社員同等重要，陶德曼說。

sentences.english: Then those Communards who had so far escaped were herded together and given mock trials.
sentences.chinese: 倖存下來的公社社員們被集體模擬審判。

sentences.english: Ensure that a significant number of club members and their partners participate in new service projects.
sentences.chinese: 務使有相當多的社員及其伴侶參加新的服務計劃。

sentences.english: How can you generate enthusiasm in your club for recruiting new members?
sentences.chinese: 在你經驗中，於貴社吸收新社員時有何益處？

sentences.english: Who in your club can educate new members?
sentences.chinese: 貴社裏有誰可以教育新社員？

sentences.english: Report on the progress of Interact and Rotaract in the district.
sentences.chinese: 提醒祕書們繳交社員出席報告至地區總監。

sentences.english: What are some specific challenges Rotary faces in your district when recruiting new members?
sentences.chinese: 在召募新社員時，扶輪在貴地區面臨哪些特定的困難？

sentences.english: What are three ways to increase membership in your district?
sentences.chinese: 請舉出三種可以增加貴地區社員的方法？

sentences.english: The member right originated in ancient German law, and became established in the modern times.
sentences.chinese: 社員權產生於日耳曼法，正式確立於近代。

sentences.english: The member's congress determines a resolution of disincorporation.
sentences.chinese: 二社員大會之解散決議。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
mistake/error/to miss/to harm/to delay/to neglect/mistakenly
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
president or director (of association etc)
verse
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
the human world/the earth
Gentlemen! (start of a speech)/Ladies and Gentlemen!
teacher/CL:個|个[ge4]
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to unite in common effort
different/other/hetero-/unusual/strange/surprising/to distinguish/to separate/to discriminate
to put pen to paper/pen mark

various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
